item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "I, with a deeper instinct, choose a man who compels my strength, who makes enormous demands on me, who does not doubt my courage or my toughness, who does not believe me naïve or innocent, who has the courage to treat me like a woman." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Epicurus
item.description: "Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for." -- Epicurus

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Ultimately, it is the desire, not the desired, that we love." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "In individuals, insanity is rare; but in groups, parties, nations and epochs, it is the rule." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Thoughts are the shadows of our feelings -- always darker, emptier and simpler." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by George Carlin
Scarlet add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "I often warn people: "Somewhere along the way, someone is going to tell you, 'There is no "I" in team.' What you should tell them is, 'Maybe not. But there is an "I" in independence, individuality and integrity." -- George Carlin

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "And the danger is that in this move toward new horizons and far directions, that I may lose what I have now, and not find anything except loneliness." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Jim MORRISON
item.description: "The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are. You trade in your reality for a role. You trade in your sense for an act. You give up your ability to feel, and in exchange, put on a mask. There can't be any large-scale revolution until there's a personal revolution, on an individual level. It's got to happen inside first." -- Jim MORRISON

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by don Miguel Ruiz
item.description: "The Four Agreements 1. Be impeccable with your word. 2. Don’t take anything personally. 3. Don’t make assumptions. 4. Always do your best. " -- don Miguel Ruiz

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Scarlet add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "Some people see the glass half full. Others see it half empty. I see a glass that's twice as big as it needs to be." -- George Carlin
